# Alliance Undone (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[2nd Level Hexblade Spells|Hexblade 2]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a severed cord)/DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Area:** 10-ft./level radius

**Duration:** 1 minute

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Exemplars of Evil (WotC), pg. 27

*You chant words of discord and unrest while making a breaking motion with your hands. Those around you fall quiet as suspicion and distrust take root in their hearts.*

*Alliance undone* suppresses the benefits gained from alliances, including, but not limited to, the effects of ceremony feats, teamwork benefits, companion spirits, and affiliations.
